channel.title: "Adding music to a client"
channel.description:
Hey guys, im here to ask for some help, i need to no how to add a music menu, which anybody can put music 2 if they download this client! Just a simple, play, pause, next, previous.
Please help me out, johno :confused:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 29, 2009, 08:48:49 am[/size][hr]Please can you help me, im begging cmon guys plese please
